traits.Amphibious: The merrow can breathe air and water.

actions.Multiattack: The merrow makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws or harpoon.
actions.Bite: Melee Weapon Attack: +6+1d4 + 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage.
actions.Claws: Melee Weapon Attack: +6+1d4 + 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (2d4 + 4) slashing damage.
actions.Harpoon: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +6+1d4 + 4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) piercing damage. If the target is a Huge or smaller creature, it must succeed on a Strength contest against the merrow or be pulled up to 20 feet toward the merrow.
